data.name: BCFFileInfo
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `BCFFileInfo` ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `FileName` TEXT, `FilePath` TEXT, `UploadedBy` TEXT, `UploadedDate` DATETIME, `CreationDate` DATETIME, `IsPrimary` BOOLEAN, PRIMARY KEY(Guid) );

data.name: BimSnippet
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `BimSnippet` ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `SnippetType` TEXT, `isExternal` BOOLEAN, `Reference` TEXT, `ReferenceSchema` TEXT, `FileContent` BLOB, `Topic_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Topic_Guid`) REFERENCES Topic ( Guid ) )

data.name: Bitmaps
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Bitmaps" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `Bitmap` TEXT, `Bitmap_Image` BLOB, `Reference` TEXT, `Location` TEXT, `Normal` TEXT, `Up` TEXT, `Height` REAL, `Viewpoints_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Viewpoints_Guid`) REFERENCES Viewpoints ( Guid ) )

data.name: ClippingPlane
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "ClippingPlane" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `Location` TEXT, `Direction` TEXT, `Viewpoints_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Viewpoints_Guid`) REFERENCES Viewpoints ( Guid ) )

data.name: Comment
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Comment" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `VerbalStatus` TEXT, `Status` TEXT, `Date` NUMERIC, `Author` TEXT, `Comment` TEXT, `ModifiedDate` NUMERIC, `ModifiedAuthor` TEXT, `Topic_Guid` TEXT, `Viewpoint_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Topic_Guid`) REFERENCES Topic ( Guid ), FOREIGN KEY(`Viewpoint_Guid`) REFERENCES Viewpoints (Guid) )

data.name: Components
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Components` ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `IfcGuid` TEXT, `Selected` BOOLEAN, `Visible` BOOLEAN, `Color` BLOB, `OriginatingSystem` TEXT, `AuthoringToolId` TEXT, `Viewpoints_Guid` TEXT, `ElementName` TEXT, `Action` TEXT, `Responsibility` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Viewpoints_Guid`) REFERENCES Viewpoints ( Guid ) );

data.name: Direction
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Direction" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `X` REAL, `Y` REAL, `Z` REAL, `Viewpoints_Guid` TEXT, `File_Guid` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`File_Guid`) REFERENCES BCFFileInfo ( Guid ) )

data.name: DocumentReferences
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `DocumentReferences` ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `isExternal` BOOLEAN, `ReferenceDocument` TEXT, `FileContent` BLOB, `Description` TEXT, `Topic_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Topic_Guid`) REFERENCES Topic ( Guid ) )

data.name: HeaderFile
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `HeaderFile` ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `IfcProject` TEXT, `IfcSpatialStructureElement` TEXT, `isExternal` BOOLEAN, `FileName` TEXT, `Date` DATETIME, `Reference` TEXT, `Topic_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Topic_Guid`) REFERENCES Topic ( Guid ) )

data.name: Labels
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Labels` ( `Label` TEXT, `Topic_Guid` TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(`Topic_Guid`) REFERENCES Topic ( Guid ) )

data.name: Lines
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Lines" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `StartPoint` TEXT, `EndPoint` TEXT, `Viewpoints_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Viewpoints_Guid`) REFERENCES Viewpoints ( Guid ) )

data.name: OrthogonalCamera
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "OrthogonalCamera" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `CameraViewPoint` TEXT, `CameraDirection` TEXT, `CameraUpVector` TEXT, `ViewToWorldScale` REAL, `Viewpoints_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Viewpoints_Guid`) REFERENCES Viewpoints ( Guid ) )

data.name: PerspectiveCamera
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "PerspectiveCamera" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `CameraViewPoint` TEXT, `CameraDirection` TEXT, `CameraUpVector` TEXT, `FieldOfView` REAL, `Viewpoints_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Viewpoints_Guid`) REFERENCES Viewpoints ( Guid ) )

data.name: Point
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Point" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `X` REAL, `Y` REAL, `Z` REAL, `Viewpoints_Guid` TEXT, `File_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`File_Guid`) REFERENCES BCFFileInfo ( Guid ) )

data.name: Project
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Project` ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `ProjectId` TEXT, `ProjectName` TEXT, `ProjectExtension_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`ProjectExtension_Guid`) REFERENCES ProjectExtension ( Guid ) )

data.name: ProjectExtension
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "ProjectExtension" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `ExtensionSchema` TEXT, `File_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`File_Guid`) REFERENCES BCFFileInfo ( Guid ) )

data.name: RelatedTopics
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `RelatedTopics` ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `Topic_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Topic_Guid`) REFERENCES Topic ( Guid ) )

data.name: RevitExtensions
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `RevitExtensions` ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `ParameterName` TEXT, `ParameterValue` TEXT, `Color` BLOB, PRIMARY KEY(Guid) );

data.name: Topic
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Topic" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `TopicType` TEXT, `TopicStatus` TEXT, `Title` TEXT, `ReferenceLink` TEXT, `Description` TEXT, `Priority` TEXT, `TopicIndex` INTEGER, `CreationDate` DATETIME, `CreationAuthor` TEXT, `ModifiedDate` DATETIME, `ModifiedAuthor` TEXT, `AssignedTo` TEXT, `File_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`File_Guid`) REFERENCES BCFFileInfo ( Guid ) )

data.name: Version
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Version" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `VersionId` TEXT, `DetailedVersion` TEXT, `File_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`File_Guid`) REFERENCES BCFFileInfo ( Guid ) )

data.name: Viewpoints
data.value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Viewpoints" ( `Guid` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `Viewpoint` TEXT, `Snapshot` TEXT, `Snapshot_Image` BLOB, `Topic_Guid` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(Guid), FOREIGN KEY(`Topic_Guid`) REFERENCES Topic ( Guid ) )
